events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan colliding with a street pole on April 30th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident since it involves a motor vehicle collision on a public road.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to handle this auto collision case promptly.
Acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and notified the customer about next steps and required documentation.
Requested damage photos, police report, and repair estimates from the customer to proceed with the investigation.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including photos of the damaged vehicle and official police report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has commenced, reviewing all submitted evidence.
Completed investigation confirming liability is with another driver and the policy covers the damage as expected.
Proposed a settlement amount based on repair estimates and terms of the auto insurance policy coverage.
Received positive feedback from the customer expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and communication.
Claim has been formally approved for payment processing per the agreed settlement terms.
Issued payment to the customer covering vehicle repairs as specified in the approved settlement.
Claim case closed following successful payment and resolution, with all parties informed accordingly.
The auto accident claim records have been archived for future reference and compliance.
